metadata.title: YouTube Video Ideas 2025: 100+ Content Ideas That Get Views
metadata.description: Stuck on what to make? Get proven YouTube video ideas for any niche. Content inspiration that actually performs.

hero.headline: YouTube Video Ideas That Actually Get Views in 2025
hero.subheadline: Never run out of content ideas. Proven formats and topics that perform across any niche.

sections.content: Every creator hits the content block wall. The key is having reliable formats and idea generation systems that never run dry. This guide provides proven video formats that work across niches, plus strategies to generate unlimited ideas for your specific audience.

content.title: List Videos
content.description: Top 10, 5 best, 7 mistakes. Lists are easy to make and viewers love the clear structure.

content.title: Tutorial Content
content.description: How-to guides never go out of style. Solve specific problems your audience has.

content.title: Comparison Videos
content.description: X vs Y, before/after, old vs new. Comparisons satisfy decision-making viewers.

sections.title: Universal Video Ideas
content: Day in my life as a [your profession/hobby]
Reacting to [trending topic in your niche]
Beginner mistakes I made (and how to avoid them)
My [equipment/tools/setup] tour
Answering your questions (Q&A)
Trying [new technique/product] for the first time
The truth about [controversial topic]
What I wish I knew when I started
Rating [products/trends] in my niche
Behind the scenes of [process in your work]

sections.title: Idea Generation Methods
content: Check YouTube autocomplete for your topics
Browse Reddit communities in your niche
Answer questions from your comments
Respond to competitor videos with your take
Cover trending news in your space
Create follow-ups to your best performers
Turn long videos into multiple topics
Ask your audience what they want
Repurpose content from other platforms

sections.title: High-Performing Content Types
content: Tutorials that solve specific problems
Stories with emotional hooks
Controversial or contrarian takes
Transformation and journey content
Expert interviews and collaborations
Challenges and experiments
Reviews and honest opinions

faq.question: How do I find ideas for my specific niche?
faq.answer: Search your niche keywords on YouTube, check 'People also search for', browse niche subreddits, and analyze what competitors' videos get the most views.

faq.question: Should I copy what's working for others?
faq.answer: Study successful formats but add your unique perspective. Same topic, different angle. Pure copying provides no value and doesn't build your brand.

faq.question: How many video ideas should I have queued?
faq.answer: Aim for 20-30 ideas in your backlog. This prevents content panic and lets you choose the best idea for your current energy and resources.

faq.question: What if my ideas have already been done?
faq.answer: Every idea has been done. Your unique take, personality, and presentation is what matters. There's room for multiple perspectives on any topic.
